__e: Now if you are a friend of the family, what you're saying, Tony, doesn't make any sense.
Tony, it doesn't matter what I tell you, there's nothing you can do.
It's the most Tony will ever have seen of you. You don't want to put him off.
You know, Tony, I don't know what this is about, you said, that you had a son, right?
It's been a while since Tony put out like that.
Did Tony say anything about us having trouble working together?
Tony was telling us that it's just you at home. - Is that right? - Yes.
Tony was telling us that it's just you at home. - Is that right? - Yes.
Did Tony do something to fix that?
Why would Tony do that to me?
- You know. Tony told me you know.
Because Tony told me not to.
Why would Tony do that to me?
- You know. Tony told me you know.
Because Tony told me not to.
You're supposed to be a friend, and I've come here with a problem.
You mean, aside from Tony being here before us?
And... And that Tony is my...
Ezekiel, you said that a new wind would create a new future.
I haven't been afraid of my father for quite some time.
Is Tony the one that... tells you things?
Tony Stark has taken everything I care about.
And, of course, he was telling that to Tony Stark, but that was also us telling that to the audience to see how they'd react.
